ygData.subject: Re: Alliance Victory (Well Almost)
ygData.msgSnippet: Atma reaches Deemos. You! Alliance! Stand down, I m goign to destroy this hunk of junk! If I die, then you can kill him. Atma says. Deemos flips out a pistol

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Atma reaches Deemos.

"You! Alliance! Stand down, I'm goign to destroy this hunk of junk! If I
die, then you can kill him." Atma says. Deemos flips out a pistol and
laughs. Atma raises his hand. Deemos stares at a eerie glow. Atma points to
the ground, a light engulfs them both and blasts them both away, Psuedo was
also damaged by this. Atma stood up, Deemos was laying there.

"Good day, Alliance." Atma said. He picked up Psuedo and Land Mine and ran
toward Phobia's ship.

"Wait! I'm going aboard!" Atma called out. Deemos slowly turned over.

"I admit defeat." Deemos said. He started crawling away...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 08, 2000 8:14 PM
Subject: Alliance Victory (Well Almost)


>
> ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/The Oblitercons::
>
> Zardus nods, returning Phobia's tranmission. "The Maximals are no longer a
> threat in the area," he says, "But there are still a few. We'll take care
of
> them."
>
> He switches his comm to an Alliance frequency. "Alliance bots, surround
the
> Maximal with the hostage. I'll do the talking. If he doesn't cooperate,
kill
> them both."
>
> He frowns as he sees Gotron, Treadshot, and Catgut running into Phobia's
> ship. "Gotron, Treadshot, Catgut," he says to them over the comm-link,
"Where
> are you going? The ship isn't our buisness, we're just here to get rid of
the
> Maximals."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica nods at Zardus' orders, flying to hover in front of Deemos, his
> missile launcher ready. Bloodystrike flies in, stopping on the other side
of
> the Maximal, his missile launcher also ready.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Dark One transforms into robot mode, flying down to hover behind Deemos,
Pyro
> in tank mode and Scavanger in HUMVEE mode driving in to stop on either
side
> of him, blocking the Maximal's escape back.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Breakdown and Hiss transform back into robot modes, walking up on either
side
> of Deemos, their weapons ready.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus flies in, looking at Deemos, his weapons ready as well. "You have
no
> where to go, Maximal," he says loudly enough for Deemos to hear him, "One
> move and you, and the Predacon hostage, die. Drop the Pred and you might
yet
> live..."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing Atma heading for Deemos, DevilDuer runs up to the bot. "Whooa," he
> says, "I don't think you should interfere there, it could get ugly."
>
>
>
